field.name: Title
field.description: Add a title (Go to styling to change the size)

field.name: Hide title
field.description: Select to hide the title

field.name: Subtitle
field.description: Add a subtitle (Go to styling to change the size)

field.name: Text
field.description: Add a text

field.name: Image
field.description: Select an image

Parameter.name: Use focal point selector for images

field.name: Image aspect ratio
field.description: For well-cropped image, select an image aspect ratio that matches your content

field.name: Alt text (Alternative text)
field.description: Describe the purpose of the image, or leave blank if the image is purely decorative

field.name: Layout
field.description: Select how you want your content to be displayed

field.name: Label - Button 1
field.description: Button label is only visible if there is a button link. You need to stretch the link if you have added a link without a button label

field.name: Stretched link - Button 1
field.description: Stretch the link to make the whole column clickable or if you have added a link without a button label (does not work if there are 2 buttons)

option.name: No, do not stretch the link
Yes, stretch the link and make the whole column clickable

field.name: Page link - Button 1
field.description: Add a button link

field.name: Label - Button 2
field.description: Button label is only visible if there is a button link. You need to stretch the link if you have added a link without a button label

field.name: Stretched link - Button 2
field.description: Stretch the link to make the whole column clickable or if you have added a link without a button label (does not work if there are 2 buttons)

option.name: No, do not stretch the link
Yes, stretch the link and make the whole column clickable

field.name: Page link - Button 2
field.description: Add a button link

field.name: Theme
field.description: Select a theme (background and text color) to style the content

field.name: Button style - Button 1
field.description: Select a button style

field.name: Button style - Button 2
field.description: Select a button style

field.name: Image resized and fit
field.description: Specify how you want the image to fit

field.name: Space around
field.description: Adjust the spacing for well-aligned content

field.name: Text readability
field.description: Having the right amount of characters on each line is key to readability. This setting is activated by default and will shorten the number of characters on each line. We encourage you to have it on if you find yourself having to move your neck/head to read the text in a single column. Otherwise, disable it and the text will then be limited by the column width.

field.name: Heading level
field.description: Select the desired heading level. This will only affect the tag around the title, not the styling or font size. This also help you get better SEO. If you select Auto, h2 will be used.

field.name: Title size
field.description: Do you want to make your title font size smaller or larger? Select a font size for well-sized content

field.name: Subtitle size
field.description: Do you want to make your subtitle font size smaller or larger? Select a font size for well-sized content
